nodes.text: The Trune family farm was a farm located on the Mid Rim planet Yungbrii, ran by the mother and father of Sela Trune, who left to join the New Republic Security Bureau. Less than a month afterwards, the farm was caught in the crossfire of a skirmish between New Republic officers and members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi, who used Trune's family as living shields. Trune's parents and younger brother Gaithel were killed, and the surviving Spice Runners escaped aboard a stolen starship.
